adm:managed-object.name: fingerprint-certificate-mapper
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
maps client certificates to user entries by looking for the MD5 or SHA1 fingerprint in a specified attribute of user entries.

adm:property.name: fingerprint-attribute
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the attribute in which to look for the fingerprint.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the name or OID of the attribute whose value should exactly match the MD5 or SHA1 representation of the certificate fingerprint.

adm:property.name: fingerprint-algorithm
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the name of the digest algorithm that should be used to compute the fingerprint of client certificates. The value must be either "MD5" or "SHA1".

adm:value.name: md5
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Use the MD5 digest algorithm to compute certificate fingerprints.

adm:value.name: sha1
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Use the SHA-1 digest algorithm to compute certificate fingerprints.

adm:property.name: user-base-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the set of base DNs below which to search for users.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the base DN(s) that should be used when performing searches to map the client certificate to a user entry. If no values are provided, then the server will search below all public naming contexts.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The server will perform the search in all public naming contexts.
